title: Multimedia-Based Training Program for Improving Speech Analysis Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic language analysis theory and foundational scientific communication skills
context.additional_context: Training applying the expert model (Bühler's theory) to enhance science communication competencies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the three functions of speech (appeal, expression, expressive function) with 80% accuracy by applying the Bühler model
Learners can correct at least 50% of their speech analysis errors by comparing them with expert analysis in a multimedia environment
Learners can apply speech analysis techniques at least 3 times in real scientific discussion scenarios to evaluate communication effectiveness
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
